languages.text: "Учение благословенного Амарната расширилось, и информация о нем достигла конклава флота Осознание. Многие из нас внезапно пропали или получили серво-епитимью за незначительные проступки. Начался конфликт. Мой прогноз показал, что наше наиболее вероятное будущее — раскол и схизма, которая уничтожит флот Осознание. И тогда я отправился к конклаву".

traits.locale_text: "Учение благословенного Амарната быстро расширилось, и информация о нем достигла конклава высших иерархов флота Осознание. Они распознали в этих убеждениях техноересь, однако не стали высказывать это обвинение вслух. Вместо этого они начали тайно испытывать тех, кого считали отступниками".

languages.text: "The teachings of the blessed Amarnat spread, and word of it reached the conclave of the Cognisance Fleet. They recognised his teachings as tech-heresy. Many Tech-Priests suddenly vanished or were subjected to servo-penance for minor transgressions. The students of Amarnat, whose number included many enlightened and respected Tech-Priests, resisted. My prognosis showed that our most likely future was a schism and a fratricidal war that would destroy the Cognisance Fleet. That was when I headed to the conclave."
languages.original_text: "Учение благословенного Амарната расширилось, и информация о нем достигла конклава флота Осознание. Многие из нас внезапно пропали или получили серво-епитимью за незначительные проступки. Начался конфликт. Мой прогноз показал, что наше наиболее вероятное будущее — раскол и схизма, которая уничтожит флот Осознание. И тогда я отправился к конклаву".

traits.locale_text: "The teaching of blessed Amarnat spread quickly, and the information about it reached the conclave of the highest hierarchs of Consciousness Fleet. They recognized his teachings as technoheresy but chose not to accuse him. Instead, they began to secretly test those they considered apostates."

"The teaching of blessed Amarnat spread quickly, and the information about it reached the conclave of the highest hierarchs of Consciousness Fleet. They recognized his teachings as technoheresy but chose not to accuse him. Instead, they began to secretly test those they considered apostates."

"The teachings of the blessed Amarnat spread, and word of it reached the conclave of the Cognisance Fleet. They recognised his teachings as tech-heresy. Many Tech-Priests suddenly vanished or were subjected to servo-penance for minor transgressions. The students of Amarnat, whose number included many enlightened and respected Tech-Priests, resisted. My prognosis showed that our most likely future was a schism and a fratricidal war that would destroy the Cognisance Fleet. That was when I headed to the conclave."

Many Tech-Priests suddenly vanished or were subjected to servo-penance for minor transgressions. The students of Amarnat, whose number included many enlightened and respected Tech-Priests, resisted. My prognosis showed that our most likely future was a schism and a fratricidal war that would destroy the Cognisance Fleet. That was when I headed to the conclave."

languages.text: "Die Lehren des gesegneten Amarnat haben sich verbreitet und so auch die Konklave der Erkenntnisflotte erreicht. Sie haben seine Lehren als Tech-Ketzerei erkannt. Viele Techpriester sind plötzlich verschwunden oder wurden wegen kleinster Vergehen zur Servo-Buße verdammt. Die Schüler des Amarnat, zu denen viele erleuchtete und angesehene Techpriester zählten, setzten sich zur Wehr. Meine Prognose zeigte, dass unsere wahrscheinlichste Zukunft eine Spaltung und ein Bruderkrieg sein würde, der die Erkenntnisflotte zerstört. Da bin ich zur Konklave gereist."
languages.original_text: "The teachings of the blessed Amarnat spread, and word of it reached the conclave of the Cognisance Fleet. They recognised his teachings as tech-heresy. Many Tech-Priests suddenly vanished or were subjected to servo-penance for minor transgressions. The students of Amarnat, whose number included many enlightened and respected Tech-Priests, resisted. My prognosis showed that our most likely future was a schism and a fratricidal war that would destroy the Cognisance Fleet. That was when I headed to the conclave."

traits.locale_text: "Die Lehren des gesegneten Amarnat haben sich verbreitet und so auch die Konklave der Erkenntnisflotte erreicht. Sie haben seine Lehren als Tech-Ketzerei erkannt. Viele Techpriester sind plötzlich verschwunden oder wurden wegen kleinster Vergehen zur Servo-Buße verdammt. Die Schüler des Amarnat, zu denen viele erleuchtete und angesehene Techpriester zählten, setzten sich zur Wehr. Meine Prognose zeigte, dass unsere wahrscheinlichste Zukunft eine Spaltung und ein Bruderkrieg sein würde, der die Erkenntnisflotte zerstört. Da bin ich zur Konklave gereist."

languages.text: « Les enseignements du bienheureux Amarnat se répandent, à tel point que la Flotte de la Connaissance a fini par en avoir vent. Elle les a assimilés à de la technohérésie. Bien des technoprêtres ont soudain disparu ou ont été soumis à une servopénitence pour des transgressions mineures. Les disciples d'Amarnat, parmi lesquels se trouvaient de nombreux technoprêtres éclairés et respectés, ont résisté. D'après mon pronostic, nous nous dirigions tout droit vers un schisme et une guerre fratricide qui entraînerait la destruction de la Flotte de la Connaissance. C'est alors que je suis parti pour le conclave. »
languages.original_text: "The teachings of the blessed Amarnat spread, and word of it reached the conclave of the Cognisance Fleet. They recognised his teachings as tech-heresy. Many Tech-Priests suddenly vanished or were subjected to servo-penance for minor transgressions. The students of Amarnat, whose number included many enlightened and respected Tech-Priests, resisted. My prognosis showed that our most likely future was a schism and a fratricidal war that would destroy the Cognisance Fleet. That was when I headed to the conclave."

traits.locale_text: « Les enseignements du bienheureux Amarnat se répandent, à tel point que la Flotte de la Connaissance a fini par en avoir vent. Elle les a assimilés à de la technohérésie. Bien des technoprêtres ont soudain disparu ou ont été soumis à une servopénitence pour des transgressions mineures. Les disciples d'Amarnat, parmi lesquels se trouvaient de nombreux technoprêtres éclairés et respectés, ont résisté. D'après mon pronostic, nous nous dirigions tout droit vers un schisme et une guerre fratricide qui entraînerait la destruction de la Flotte de la Connaissance. C'est alors que je suis parti pour le conclave. »

languages.text: “蒙福者阿玛纳特的教义流传开来，传播到了真理开拓者舰队的密会之中。那些人认为阿玛纳特的教义是异端邪说。许多技术神甫要么凭空失踪，要么由于轻微的过失遭到了严重的惩罚。阿玛纳特的学徒之中包括许多思想开明、受人尊敬的技术神甫，他们进行了抵抗。我的预测显示，这场冲突极可能会导致自相残杀，最终让真理开拓者舰队发生分裂，毁于一旦。而正是在那个时候，我出发前往密会。”
languages.original_text: "The teachings of the blessed Amarnat spread, and word of it reached the conclave of the Cognisance Fleet. They recognised his teachings as tech-heresy. Many Tech-Priests suddenly vanished or were subjected to servo-penance for minor transgressions. The students of Amarnat, whose number included many enlightened and respected Tech-Priests, resisted. My prognosis showed that our most likely future was a schism and a fratricidal war that would destroy the Cognisance Fleet. That was when I headed to the conclave."

traits.locale_text: “蒙福者阿玛纳特的教义流传开来，传播到了真理开拓者舰队的密会之中。那些人认为阿玛纳特的教义是异端邪说。许多技术神甫要么凭空失踪，要么由于轻微的过失遭到了严重的惩罚。阿玛纳特的学徒之中包括许多思想开明、受人尊敬的技术神甫，他们进行了抵抗。我的预测显示，这场冲突极可能会导致自相残杀，最终让真理开拓者舰队发生分裂，毁于一旦。而正是在那个时候，我出发前往密会。”

languages.text: 「聖なるアマルナトの教えが広まり、その噂はコグニサンス艦隊の評議会にも届いた。奴らは彼の教えを技術異端と認識したのだ。多くの技術司祭が突然姿を消したり、軽微な違反に対するサーボ懺悔を受けたりした。アマルナトの弟子たちには、多くの啓示を受け尊敬される技術司祭も含まれており、彼らは抵抗した。自分の予測では、最も可能性の高い未来は分裂と内紛で、それがコグニサンス艦隊を壊滅させるというものであった。そこで、自分は秘密会議に向かったのである」
languages.original_text: "The teachings of the blessed Amarnat spread, and word of it reached the conclave of the Cognisance Fleet. They recognised his teachings as tech-heresy. Many Tech-Priests suddenly vanished or were subjected to servo-penance for minor transgressions. The students of Amarnat, whose number included many enlightened and respected Tech-Priests, resisted. My prognosis showed that our most likely future was a schism and a fratricidal war that would destroy the Cognisance Fleet. That was when I headed to the conclave."

traits.locale_text: 「聖なるアマルナトの教えが広まり、その噂はコグニサンス艦隊の評議会にも届いた。奴らは彼の教えを技術異端と認識したのだ。多くの技術司祭が突然姿を消したり、軽微な違反に対するサーボ懺悔を受けたりした。アマルナトの弟子たちには、多くの啓示を受け尊敬される技術司祭も含まれており、彼らは抵抗した。自分の予測では、最も可能性の高い未来は分裂と内紛で、それがコグニサンス艦隊を壊滅させるというものであった。そこで、自分は秘密会議に向かったのである」

languages.text: «Las enseñanzas del bendito Amarnat se extendieron, y el cónclave de la Flota Conciencia tomó nota de ello. Reconocieron sus enseñanzas como tecnoherejía. Muchos tecnosacerdotes desaparecieron repentinamente o fueron condenados a servopenitencia por transgresiones menores. Los estudiantes de Amarnat, cuyas filas incluían a muchos tecnosacerdotes iluminados y respetados, resistieron. Mi prognosis mostró que nuestro destino más probable era un cisma y una guerra fratricida que destruiría la Flota Conciencia. Fue entonces cuando me dirigí al cónclave».
languages.original_text: "The teachings of the blessed Amarnat spread, and word of it reached the conclave of the Cognisance Fleet. They recognised his teachings as tech-heresy. Many Tech-Priests suddenly vanished or were subjected to servo-penance for minor transgressions. The students of Amarnat, whose number included many enlightened and respected Tech-Priests, resisted. My prognosis showed that our most likely future was a schism and a fratricidal war that would destroy the Cognisance Fleet. That was when I headed to the conclave."

Many Tech-Priests suddenly vanished or were subjected to servo-penance for minor transgressions. The students of Amarnat, whose number included many enlightened and respected Tech-Priests, resisted. My prognosis showed that our most likely future was a schism and a fratricidal war that would destroy the Cognisance Fleet. That was when I headed to the conclave."

languages.text: "Kutsanmış Amarnat'ın öğretileri giderek yayıldı ve sözleri Malumat Filosu'nun meclisine kadar ulaştı. Öğretilerini tekno kâfirlik olarak addettiler. Birçok kardeş aniden ortadan kayboldu veya nispeten küçük suçlardan ötürü hizmecezaya çarptırıldı. Amarnat'ın, aralarında birçok saygı duyulan ve aydın kardeşimizin bulunduğu öğrencileri ise direndi. Prognozum, bölünme yaşadığımız ve birbirimizi öldürdüğümüz, Malumat Filosu'nu da yok ettiğimiz bir muhtemel gelecek öngördü. Meclise o zaman gittim."
languages.original_text: "The teachings of the blessed Amarnat spread, and word of it reached the conclave of the Cognisance Fleet. They recognised his teachings as tech-heresy. Many Tech-Priests suddenly vanished or were subjected to servo-penance for minor transgressions. The students of Amarnat, whose number included many enlightened and respected Tech-Priests, resisted. My prognosis showed that our most likely future was a schism and a fratricidal war that would destroy the Cognisance Fleet. That was when I headed to the conclave."

Prognozum, bölünme yaşadığımız ve birbirimizi öldürdüğümüz, Malumat Filosu'nu da yok ettiğimiz bir muhtemel gelecek öngördü. Meclise o zaman gittim."
